title: APPLICATION OF THE CLAIM-BASED FRAILTY INDEX (CFI) TO STRUCTURED ELECTRONIC HEALTH RECORD (EHR) DATA
details: MJ Kwak, C Schaefer, Y Kim, S Fu, A Dhoble, N Rianon… - Innovation in Aging, 2024
abstract: The claim-based frailty index (CFI) was initially developed to identify frailty in Medicare claims. However, the application of CFI to structured data from an Electronic Health Record (EHR) has not been thoroughly studied. We aimed to apply …
